info.author: Carl Banks
info.description:
Read, write, and manipulate 3DS files.

Dice3DS is a package to to read, write, and manipulate 3D Studio
format files in Python.  Includes example code to convert 3DS files
into OpenGL display lists, and utilities to view 3DS models and to
dump the contents of the 3DS file as formatted text.

Requires Python 2.6 and numpy 1.1.0.  Viewer requires some combination of PyOpenGL, and Python Imaging Library, pyglet, and PyGame.  The first two should be enough.
info.name: Dice3DS
info.platform:
Probably any platform that uses floating point that kind of resembles IEEE 754.
 Tested on Linux.
info.html_description:
Read, write, and manipulate 3DS files.

Dice3DS is a package to to read, write, and manipulate 3D Studio format files in Python. Includes example code to convert 3DS files into OpenGL display lists, and utilities to view 3DS models and to dump the contents of the 3DS file as formatted text.

Requires Python 2.6 and numpy 1.1.0. Viewer requires some combination of PyOpenGL, and Python Imaging Library, pyglet, and PyGame. The first two should be enough.
